plot: The life of 25-year-old Isaac as he struggles to expand the scope of his life beyond the walled cubicle of his blossoming career as a telemarketer.
plot_en: The life of 25-year-old Isaac as he struggles to expand the scope of his life beyond the walled cubicle of his blossoming career as a telemarketer.
plot_es: The life of 25-year-old Isaac as he struggles to expand the scope of his life beyond the walled cubicle of his blossoming career as a telemarketer.
title: Isaac
